- Robust standard errors. Use the [sandwich](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sandwich/index.html)
- Multiway Error Covariance Standard Error Clustering: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/multiwayvcov/index.html
- plm https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/plm/index.html
- https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/clusterSEs/clusterSEs.pdf - pairs cluster
bootstrapped t-statistics, and wild cluster bootstrapped t-statistics (the latter two techniques
based on Cameron, Gelbach, and Miller (2008)  are included for use with GLM, ivreg, plm (pooling or fixed effects), and mlogit models.

- [clubSandwich](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/clubSandwich/vignettes/panel-data-CRVE.html)

- Panel corrected standard errors [pcse](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/pcse/index.html)
